settings.name: Enable DMX support (hardware: MAX485 on TX Pin needed, ATTENTION: Does not compile/work togeter with AudioRective WLED, use AR disable option if required)
Set default LED pin GPIO number(s) (one or more numbers separated by commas)
Define the name of the internal WiFI Access Point (default: WLED-AP)

envtextfield:
[env:custom_build]
extends = env:esp32dev
build_flags = ${env:esp32dev.build_flags} -D WLED_ENABLE_DMX -D DATA_PINS=16,17,18,19 -D WLED_AP_SSID='"DMX-Control-Board"'
